infotexts.spw_enabledtooltip: Enable all functionality of the mod
infotexts.spw_syncsettingstooltip: Enable the syncing of host and client configs.
infotexts.spw_syncsettingsalert: Note: This server has syncing enabled - all players will automatically use the host's settings (values in parentheses)
infotexts.spw_focustargetaudiotooltip: Simulates audio from the POV of the current target (i.e., you hear what the turret/camera hears)
infotexts.spw_lowpassfrequencytooltip: The corner frequency used to muffle sounds (adjusting this setting mid-round will briefly freeze the game)
infotexts.spw_voicelowpassfrequencytooltip: The corner frequency used to muffle voice chat
infotexts.spw_muffledvoicevolumetooltip: Volume of lowpassed player voices behind a wall/water surface
infotexts.spw_muffledsoundvolumetooltip: Volume of lowpassed non-looping sounds behind a wall/water surface
infotexts.spw_muffledcomponentvolumetooltip: Volume of lowpassed looping component/status effect sounds behind a wall/water surface
infotexts.spw_submergedvolumetooltip: The volume of submerged sounds when the listener is also submerged in the same body of water
infotexts.spw_eavesdroppingmaxdistancetooltip: The maximum distance the player's head can be from a door while eavesdropping
infotexts.spw_hydrophonerangetooltip: The range of being able to hear underwater movement and the additional range added to all sounds outside the submarine
infotexts.spw_mufflesubmergedplayer: Muffle audio when the player's head is underwater (recommended)
infotexts.spw_mufflesubmergedviewtargettooltip: Muffle audio when the viewed target is underwater (i.e., turrets, cameras, etc)
infotexts.spw_mufflesoundsinwatertooltip: Enable the muffling of sounds that are positioned under the surface of the water (recommended)
infotexts.spw_muffleflowsoundstooltip: Enable the muffling of water flow sounds from leaks
infotexts.spw_mufflefiresoundstooltip: Enable the muffling of fire sounds
infotexts.spw_spw_divingsuitpitchtooltip: The change in pitch to most sounds when wearing a diving suit (stacks additively)
infotexts.spw_submergedpitchtooltip: The change in pitch to most sounds when the listener is submerged (stacks additively)
infotexts.spw_hidesettingstooltip: Warning: Enabling this setting will remove the "Soundproof Settings" button from your UI. You must manually edit or delete your config.json file to restore this setting.
infotexts.spw_updateserverconfig: SPW: Host modified settings - the server config has been updated
infotexts.spw_disableserverconfig: SPW: Host disabled setting synchronization - local configs now take priority
